item.title: Post 0001
item.description: I have updated my website's navigation and removed links to JS enabled pages. I will attempt to recreate the utilities in another language other than JavaScript and distribute them on my Github since I think that JavaScript opens up more security holes than has benefits.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to my website. I have designed it (barring the Uncertainty Propogation Calculator that uses JS) so that it can be viewed in any browser, even a CLI browser.
